title.rendered: Tambourine Video Production Wins Six Platinum Viddy Awards

content.rendered:
FT. LAUDERDALE, Fla., April 18, 2023 /PRNewswire/ — Tambourine, the Fort Lauderdale-headquartered digital marketing technology company serving hotels, resorts, and tourism destinations worldwide, is celebrating six Viddy Awards.

The Viddy Awards, formerly known as the “Videographer Awards,” is one of the most coveted awards in the video industry. The Viddy Awards honor video excellence and are judged by the Association of Marketing and Communication Professionals (AMCP).

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/tambourine-video-production-wins-six-platinum-viddy-awards-301800384.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
